EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName}! We hope you are looking forward to breaking up from college/sixth form.
This month's newsletter features some of the amazing opportunities and events on offer to NCS graduates in your area through The Challenge Society.
Don't forget to get your tickets for our TCS Summer Kick Off 2016 on Saturday 23rd July!
For even more opportunities, check out your local TCS website, Facebook and Twitter pages. Opportunities vary from volunteering to skills workshops, work experience, and even paid roles!
Remember...
Berkeley Homes Apprenticeships
Are you looking for a paid, where you receive a recognised qualification, whilst learning new skills on the job?
If this sounds up your street, then contact Izzy at Izzy.Mussa@hackney.gov.uk
Application deadline: Sunday 10th July
CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS Dream Smart Tutors - Medical School
This course is designed for you to gain more knowledge and understanding about medicine as a career and applying to medical school. Also how to get relevant work experience and gain advice on how to write a personal statement with help on interview techniques.
CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS 1 Day Web Design Course
This is an exclusive opportunity for NCS Graduates.
The course will:
Teach you how to redesign a website using customer-focused principles Give you chance to work alongside professionals in the digital industry End with a Q&A session with Transform UK's CEO
With just 15 spaces and over 12,000 NCS Graduates who will see this email, competition is tight! Click here for more information, or here to apply immediately.
Applications closed at midnight 10th July.
CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS FWD Beginners Film Making Programme
Are you between the ages 16 & 19 and have an interest in film making?
Mediorite are recruiting for awesome beginners in film making called FAST FWD.
It starts on the 21st July 2016 for 6 weeks and have 2 hours practical sessions.
Please email your CV to Lucy@Mediorite.co.uk
